Package io.crums.sldg.packs

Implementation classes for various bags. The XxxPack moniker denotes an implementation class for an XxxBag interface.

Immutable Types

The following types are immutable and are instantiated using a ByteBuffer argument.

  1. RowPack
  2. PathPack
  3. TrailPack
  4. EntryPack

Finally, MorselPack is just a composition of the above with added business rules.

Mutable Builder Types

Each of the above immutable types comes with its own mutable builder types. For example, RowPackBuilder.

Serialization

Presently it's only the mutable XxxBuilder types that know how to write what the XxxPacks read. (The serialization interface on the write-path here is expressed thru the super-simple Serial abstraction.) If a use case presents itself, it would be simple to add write-capability for every pack.

  • Class Summary
    Class Description
    CachingRowPack
    The base implementation is clean but terribly inefficient.
    EntryPack
    Towards serializing a morsel.
    EntryPackBuilder
    Builds an EntryPack.
    EntryPackBuilder.MetaEntry  
    MorselPack
    Implementation of a MorselBag using a composition of row-, path-, trail-, and entry-packs.
    MorselPackBuilder
    A mutable MorselBag whose serial form can be loaded as an immutable MorselPack.
    PathPack
    Serial Format
    PathPackBuilder
    A mutable PathBag whose serial form can be loaded as an immutable PathPack.
    RecurseHashRowPack
    Recursive implementation of RowBag.rowHash(long) for a bag without redundant data.
    RowPack
    Base RowBag implementation.
    RowPackBuilder
    Builds a RowPack.
    TrailPack
    Serial Format
    TrailPackBuilder
    A mutable TrailBag whose serial form can be loaded as an immutable TrailPack.
